data.text:
Hi, we're hiring, please send your details

click here

Menu

Growing brands is our business.

Branding is the art of becoming

likeable, noble, and trustable. LEARN MORE What has your website done for you

lately? Quality leads, Relevant Traffic,

Sales? If not, connect with Summit today! LEARN MORE Marketing is enthusiasm transferred

to the customer. That is our daily

goal at Summit Designs Group. LEARN MORE

Our Mission

With over 15 years of experience in the industry, our team at Summit is dedicated to bringing your business to the top! Be it a startup, small business, or large-scale organization, our core process is the same. By clarifying your brand message, understanding how users will interact with your product, and building your site to convert. This is a recipe for success, reach out to us today, we would love to learn about your business and online goals!

What We Do Best!

Website Design

Be it a startup, enterprise or large-scale organization, our strategy is the same- to understand how users will interact with your product and work on it to maximize user engagement and satisfaction.

Social Media Management

Today having a strong presence on social media is imperative to the success of your business. At Summit, we customize packages to meet your goals and fit in your budget.

Logo Design

Your logo is you or your business’s first point of contact with the outside world. If people connect with your branding, the likelihood is they’ll be more open to whatever it is offering them.

SEO Service

To learn more about how we can rank you higher in search engines with our effective SEO campaigns or to get started on your campaign, click here.

E-Commerce Experts

We develop and design eCommerce websites that provide you and your customers with the best “online shopping” experience! What this means, they will be repeat customers!!!

Branded Marketing Materials

While having a website for your business is crucial, successfully branding your business through marketing strategies is just as important.

Check out our latest Work!

Logo Design

Website Design

Social Media

Marketing Materials

Thank you to Summit for helping me come up with a plan for my new business, I had no idea where to start, however they had a plan for me to follow which resulted in a solid strategy. My new logo for my business is on point and the website is making my phone ring. Great company to work with, very proactive and responsive to all of my questions.

Summit does our social media and knocks it out of the park. We are constantly getting compliments and inquiries from their work. I highly recommend them. I've sent multiple clients to Summit for web work and they have all been highly satisfied with their results.

The team at Summit took the time to help me rebrand my business, it was quite outdated and needed a fresh modern look. From the new logo, website, and custom social posts I'm thrilled with the outcome and so are my customers ( and new ones ). Highly recommend Summit!

Summit Designs Group is the real deal. Christina Yolich (principal) is knowledgeable, insightful, and passionate about her industry. I knew I could always trust Christina’s instincts, judgment, and direction to help our company create the best website we’ve ever had. Plus, she’s fun and easy to work with!
